ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New song: Shield of songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Additional Spoiler Space Spoiler You can also buy this in the Erudin library, from the same guy who sells the other Erudin songs. Kenross Cantoforjado, 54
ygData.messageBody:
Additional Spoiler Space













Spoiler

You can also buy this in the Erudin library, from the same guy who sells the other Erudin songs.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk
